overview: Marc is a very rich industrialist married to a beautiful young woman more than twenty years his junior, Lila. The couple lives in a magnificent manor house. Today, Marc is celebrating his fiftieth birthday and Lila is determined to make him live out ALL his fantasies. To achieve this, the gorgeous brunette will skillfully play with her charms and will have no trouble convincing her husband to grant her an impromptu day off. But beware, such is taken who thought she was taking!
title: The Roaring Fifties
